title: The Adventures of Sue Turner: The Consulting Crusader

story.text: Sue Turner discovers she can see into the future but only while giving business advice. She decides to use this power to secretly help struggling businesses in her city.
A local bakery is facing bankruptcy. Sue holds a consulting session with the owners, foresees a successful strategy involving artisan bread, and guides them on implementing it.
Word of Sue's success spreads, and she is invited to consult for a failing bookstore. She advises them to create a community space which turns their fortunes around.
A tech startup is at risk of losing investor funding. During a consulting call, Sue perceives an innovative marketing approach which she confidently recommends.
Sue spends the day reflecting on her week's work, realizing her unique ability to combine foresight with experience is greatly benefiting her community.
Despite her age, Sue feels energized and decides to organize a free public seminar on business resilience and innovation.
The seminar is a huge success, attracting young and old entrepreneurs alike, inspired by Sue's capabilities and insight.

ending: As the week closed, Sue realized that by empowering others, she had found a profound sense of purpose and community.
moral: True heroism lies in empowering those around you to succeed.
